pr_title: [CDAP-16249] Show/hide unrelated fields in cause/impact datasets

timeline.message: Add test to check for functionality of unrelated fields panel
Add test to check for functionality of unrelated fields panel
Increase timeout for deploying pipeline from 10s to 15s
Add in a focus before typing

timeline.bodyText:
rather than having a callback here, it's cleaner to have this function simply return the observable and let whoever is calling it to subscribe to the actual response. When you do this, you can't handle errors in the API.
I see that you are transforming the response, so you can use map operator to the response of the observable before returning it
timeline.author: elfenheart

replies.bodyText: I've made the change to use an observable instead of a callback. There isn't any real error handling yet, though.
replies.author: yukiej

timeline.message: Address feedback: return observable instead of using callback
Add second attempt to input service account path and remove screenshot

Fix e2e test: update engine and add assertions

Change engine from spark to mapreduce

Add an assertion to check for the rendering of unrelated fields

timeline.bodyText: nit: i think in this case using ternary operator might be slightly more efficient since we won't need to render additional components
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: don't use optional chaining quite yet. It's still in draft proposal stage and still considered experimental
timeline.author: elfenheart

timeline.bodyText: provide version ranges for all versions in this file. Otherwise we will have to update the version every time
timeline.author: elfenheart
elfenheart

timeline.message: Address feedback: add versions, newline, tertiary operator for arrow icon. Remove optional chaining.

Add ExpandableField component and API call to get all fields

Add test to check for functionality of unrelated fields panel

Add ExpandableField component and API call to get all fields

Add test to check for functionality of unrelated fields panel
